resources.string: Allow push notifications when entering a warning or watch area?
An application requires Google Play Services to be enabled.
An application requires installation of Google Play Services.
An application requires an update for Google Play Services.
An application attempted to use a bad version of Google Play Services.
The billing service is not available at this time. In-app purchases will be unavailable.
Do you want to remove the advertising from the map for $1.99?
Remove the ads and get a bigger radar picture

"MyRadar is advertising supported. You can remove the ads from the map, and get a bigger radar picture with this upgrade!
Price: $1.99"
Do you want to buy Hurricane Tracker for $2.99?

"Shows current tropical conditions, with hurricanes, tropical storms and other cyclones. Displays the path of the storm and the \"cone of probability\" showing where the cyclone is forecast to be over the next 3–5 days.
Tap a storm to show details, including wind speed, pressure, and the latest discussion from the National Hurricane center. This upgrade shows current tropical cyclone activity.
Price: $2.99"

"Your purchase was successful, although it may take a short time for the purchase to show up in the app.
You may also restore purchases from \"Preferences\" and restart the app."
Do you want to buy US National Warnings & Watches for $3.99?
Display National Weather Service warnings on the map, and receive push notifications alerting you to warnings in your area

"This upgrade provides the ability to display weather warnings and watches as a layer, including severe thunderstorm and tornado warnings.
Price: $3.99"
Cannot connect to the Google Play Store. Your version of Google Play may be out of date.
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
The date on the device appears to be incorrect. Please check the date on the device.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."

"Enter a flight number, and whenever a flight plan appears in the FAA system for the specified flight number, we'll draw the path of that flight plan on the map so that you can check the weather for your filed route-of-flight."

If you enjoy using MyRadar, please take a moment to rate it.

"THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN WILMINGTON HAS ISSUED A FLOOD ADVISORY FOR... * BOONE COUNTY IN NORTHERN KENTUCKY... * CAMPBELL COUNTY IN NORTHERN KENTUCKY... * NORTHERN KENTON COUNTY IN NORTHERN KENTUCKY... * SOUTHERN HAMILTON COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST OHIO... UNTIL 345 PM EDT. AT 145 PM EDT RADAR INDICATED SHOWERS CONTINUING TO PUSH EAST ALONG AND JUST TO THE NORTH OF THE OHIO RIVER. RADAR ESTIMATES INDICATE THAT UP TO AN INCH OF RAIN HAS FALLEN ACROSS THE AREA SINCE NOON. ANOTHER HALF INCH OF RAIN WILL BE POSSIBLE THROUGH 3 PM."
